Row.Text: {1_Playername} encountered a wanderer in {2_City}.
{1_Playername} invited a wandered to settle in {2_City}, increasing its population.
{1_Playername} witnessed a Comet!
{1_Playername} witnessed a Comet, and their warriors became stronger.
{1_Playername} witnessed a Comet!
{1_Playername} witnessed a Comet, and are now closer to a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age..
{1_Playername} witnessed a Comet!
{1_Playername} witnessed a Comet, and [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron fell from the heavens.
Comet Sighted!
A comet has appeared above your empire! Your soothsayers are not sure how to deal with this, and would greatly appreciate your guidance.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Choose from one of the options below...
Valid Melee Units gain the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Drill I[ENDCOLOR] Promotion.
Gain 100 [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points.
Gain 1 [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron.
Our Warriors are inspired..
Truly a sign from the heavens.
Did something fall from the sky?
Market Day
Market Day has begun in the City. For the next 5 turns, the City receives a free Market.
The Lone Wanderer

A wanderer has arrived at the City gates, asking for asylum. He claims to have three skills, and will offer you one in exchange for a stay at your inn.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Choose from the options below...
We could use more workers.
Receive 50 Great Engineer Points in the City.
You are not welcome, foreigner.
2 Farm Improvements are destroyed near the City.
A wanderer? You and your friends suit up!
Two warriors appear near the City.
